show_name: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita in the Haunts of Evil
other_title: Doraemon e o Mundo Mundo Perdido (Portuguese)
Doraemon the Movie: Nobita and the Haunts of Evil
映画ドラえもん のび太の大魔境 (Japanese)
plot: Nobita finds an stray dog and brings him home, little does hi knows that the dog is actually a prince in his homeland, a world appart deep in the african "Smokers Forest" were the dogs evolved and have their own empire, so he and his friends take on a journey to take back the young prince to his homeland but when they get there things have changed...
